title: Moleskine Classic Notebook - Large, Ruled, Black
description: The Moleskine Classic Notebook in large size is perfect for capturing your thoughts, ideas, and daily notes. Featuring a durable black hardcover with rounded corners, this notebook is designed to withstand daily use. It includes an elastic closure to keep your notes secure and an expandable inner pocket for storing loose papers and notes. The 240 ruled pages are made of high-quality, acid-free paper that provides a smooth writing experience, making it ideal for writers, students, and professionals. The Moleskine Classic Notebook is a timeless tool that combines functionality with elegance, making it a must-have for anyone who values quality stationery.
key_features: Elastic Closure and Expandable Inner Pocket
Perfect for Daily Journaling and Note-Taking
meta_title: Moleskine Classic Notebook - Large, Ruled, Black
meta_description: Shop the Moleskine Classic Notebook in large size with ruled pages. Durable hardcover, elastic closure, and high-quality paper make it perfect for daily journaling.

title: Moleskine Classic Notebook - Large, Ruled, Red

The elastic closure keeps your notes secure, and the expandable inner pocket is perfect for storing loose papers and notes. The 240 ruled pages are made of high-quality, acid-free paper, providing a smooth writing experience. Ideal for writers, students, and professionals, the Moleskine Classic Notebook combines elegance with practicality, making it an essential tool for anyone who values quality stationery.
